eddga.hp25: You are not running you must have over swellowen guts?
eddga.kill: You can get away from my hand..hhh~

knight_of_windstorm.discovery: I'm not RuDolf The Red Nose Reindeer! You must think I'm RuDolf!
knight_of_windstorm.attack: Wanna taste the RoDolf's wild swinging blade!
knight_of_windstorm.hp50: I'm solid crystal icy pieces you can't destroy me!
knight_of_windstorm.hp25: In my shield your face will be carved!
knight_of_windstorm.kill: hh~ Until next winter you shall be frozen like that!

bloody_knight.attack: Only a matter of time until they perish...
bloody_knight.hp50: until we destroy all the enemy...we can't rest..
bloody_knight.kill: again...more blood...I'm sorry but I wish you understand it...
bloody_knight.dead: thanks...now back to the master with peace...

maya.discovery: wha...who are you! what do you want from my children?
maya.attack: you won't lay a single touch as long as I'm here!
maya.hp25: I..I can't lose! I can't lose for my childrens sake...
maya.kill: You bully my children again, I won't forgive you anymore!

mistress.discovery: Something is moving around our house! attack!
mistress.hp50: good resistence! But we have an army!
mistress.kill: We;ve got them but there could be more around the house, watch carefully!
mistress.dead: Mm...my men! Fight...Fight 'til the end!! kaark!!

moonlight.discovery: Dashing in the dark, running around is exciting!
moonlight.attack: Jingle~ Jingle~ Always I'm with the bell!
moonlight.kill: Still more to practise, you! You can't get me!
moonlight.dead: Noo..No! dying..I still have..more to do...

orc_lord.discovery: Cheeik!! with the honor of orks!!
orc_lord.attack: With my kick I'll push you out of space! cheeik!!
orc_lord.hp25: cheeik!! I feel my blood is boiling!!
orc_lord.kill: Pathetic humans don't dare come again! Cheeeeeik!!
orc_lord.dead: Human..cheeik..Human got me...but...this isn't the end!

ork_hero.attack: Don't underestimate us because we are out numbered! You will see our strength!
ork_hero.hp50: Cheeik! No more...We won't be defeated by human no more!
ork_hero.hp25: Cheeik! don't give up until the very end!! cheeik!
ork_hero.kill: cheeik..this..isn't over..yet..soon..Cheeik!..another hero will rise after me!!

osiris.attack: I'll make you fall into sleep forever too!
osiris.hp25: You are resisting hard! Lets see how far you can go!
osiris.dead: I fall back now..but I hope you won't wake me up again, human!

phreeoni.discovery: hurup! licklick I'll lick and make you wet~
phreeoni.hp25: hururup~ chapchapchap~ kukuk..you taste too strong!
phreeoni.kill: It was good. very delicious...come again anothertime..hurup~
phreeoni.dead: taste too strong...strong...no, I don't like...this taste...hururup~ chapchap~

turtle_general.discovery: what are you doing in the turtle's sacred ground!
turtle_general.attack: If you murders us just to test your stength I'll kill you for that!
turtle_general.hp25: Don't fall back! Some who try to live shall die!
turtle_general.dead: Do...Do not tell my death to other turtles!!
